Module io.inverno.mod.web
Package io.inverno.mod.web.spi

Interface ErrorRouterConfigurer<A extends ErrorExchange<Throwable>,B extends ErrorRouter<A,B,C,D>,C extends ErrorRouteManager<A,B,C,D>,D extends Route<ExchangeContext,A>>

Type Parameters:
A - the error route exchange type
B - the error router type
C - the error route manager type
D - the route type
All Superinterfaces:
Consumer<B>
All Known Subinterfaces:
ErrorWebRouterConfigurer
public interface ErrorRouterConfigurer<A extends ErrorExchange<Throwable>,B extends ErrorRouter<A,B,C,D>,C extends ErrorRouteManager<A,B,C,D>,D extends Route<ExchangeContext,A>> extends Consumer<B>

Base error router configurer interface.

An error router configurer is used to configure an error router.

Since:
1.3
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
